bibdata.title: IEEE Guide for the Detection and Location of Acoustic Emissions from Partial Discharges in Oil-Immersed Power Transformers and Reactors
IEEE Guide for the Detection and Location of Acoustic Emissions from Partial Discharges in Oil-Immersed Power Transformers and Reactors
bibdata.docidentifier: IEEE Std C57.127-2007 (Revision of IEEE Std C57.127-2000)

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: The detection and location of acoustic emissions from partial discharges and other sources in oil immersed power transformers and reactors are covered in this guide. A means of associating the relative magnitude and position of partial discharges and other sources with the acoustic signals obtained by strategically located transducers is provided.

This guide is applicable to the detection and location of acoustic emissions from partial discharges and other sources in oil immersed power transformers and reactors. It is intended to provide a means of associating the relative magnitude and position of partial discharges and other sources with the acoustic signals obtained by strategically located transducers.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibitem.formattedref: IEEE Std C57.127-2018 (Revision of IEEE Std C57.127-2007)
